title: Customized Strategy Development for Flexible Science Learning Design in the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary-level scientific fundamental concepts
context.additional_context: Requires flexible learning environments reflecting the work characteristics of current practitioners, with designs considering digital tool usage and individual learning style differences.

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three PBL task execution strategies aligned with their cognitive styles and learning preferences
Learners can complete collaborative projects solving scientific field practical problems using digital tools with over 80% completion quality
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of applied learning strategies and propose at least two improvement plans through weekly reflective journals
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
